subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
I am Mr. Anthony Gabriel, the special delivery agent assigned by the
UNITED NATIONS Office For Humanitarians Affairs to make the delivery
of your $5.8million usd in Cash to your door-steps. I am presently in
Los Angeles and i have received and noted your delivery information.
I have made arrangement with DHL to complete the delivery since it
will be less expensive and 
their delivery charges is $50. The money
mapped out for this delivery has exhausted and i cannot afford the
fees, therefore you are hereby advise to remit to me through the Form
of iTunes card or Apple card or Steam wallet card and send the scan picture.
I will update you with the delivery time and date as soon as i hear
from you. Thanks and remain blessed.
Mr. Anthony Gabriel
Email: 
anthonygabriel@diplomats.com
Special Delivery Agent

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear Mr. Anthony Gabriel,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. However, I must inform you that I am not comfortable with sending payment through gift cards such as iTunes or Steam Wallet card. This is not a standard method of conducting business transactions and raises concerns about the legitimacy of this process.

I would prefer to use a more traditional method of payment, such as bank transfer or even a secure online payment platform. Please provide me with the necessary details to proceed in this manner.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Shirley, 

The fee amount is $1500 due to the renewal and demurrage charges. 

Respond as soon possible 

Thank you, 
Anthony Gabriel
